mapper.sql: BIND_ID AS bindId, P_USERGROUP AS pUserGroup, MESSAGE_TYPE AS bindMessageType, BINDMESSAGENO AS bindMessageNo, 133 AS messageType, 0 AS probeType, USERTYPE AS userType, USERNAME AS userName, MESSAGE_NO AS messageNo, OPERATETYPE AS operationType, MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO AS messageSequenceNo, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, PARENTBINDID AS parentBindId
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND.Nextval as bindId from DUAL
insert into DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND
BIND_ID,
P_USERGROUP,
MESSAGE_TYPE,
BINDMESSAGENO,
USERTYPE,
USERNAME,
MESSAGE_NO,
OPERATETYPE,
MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO,
CREATE_TIME,
PARENTBINDID,
#{bindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pUserGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bindMessageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bindMessageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{messageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{messageSequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{parentBindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND
P_USERGROUP = #{pUserGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE_TYPE = #{bindMessageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BINDMESSAGENO = #{bindMessageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERTYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERNAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATETYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO = #{messageSequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
PARENTBINDID = #{parentBindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BIND_ID = #{bindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND
P_USERGROUP = #{pUserGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE_TYPE = #{bindMessageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BINDMESSAGENO = #{bindMessageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERTYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERNAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATETYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO = #{messageSequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
PARENTBINDID = #{parentBindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BINDMESSAGENO = #{bindMessageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and MESSAGE_TYPE = #{bindMessageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND set OPERATETYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO = #{messageSequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where BIND_ID = #{bindId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DPI_V1_CFG_USERPOLICYBIND set OPERATETYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MESSAGE_SEQUENCENO = #{messageSequenceNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where MESSAGE_NO = #{messageNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
